job_title: Web Developer Co-op in Ottawa, ON
pros: It has very Friendly environment and supportive team
cons: Because it is non-profit organization salary is low.
No promotions or increases in salary
Small, advancement limited, silos, non collaborative

job_title: Senior Software Developer in Ottawa, ON
pros: There are a couple of nice and intelligent people in the IT department.
cons:
No proper requirements documentation. You implement a feature for a couple of weeks and spend the next couple of months changing your work to match your work with the requirements that keep changing. 
CEO and COO are racist and don’t care about IT at all. They treat people really bad, insulting and humiliating developers in the meetings are a couple of examples. They have no respect for people who've been working there for more than 10 years. 
No career opportunities, just false promises.
Most of the details in the job description is a lie. They promised you to work with angularJS, responsive design. They even tell you in the job interview.
